name: Flight Attendant Simulator
description:
TAKE FLIGHT

Travel the world as you progress through your career unlocking exotic destinations, unique aircraft, and a choice of career opportunities with a variety of airline carriers.


STAY SAFE

Keep your passengers safe and comfortable by performing in-flight service and handling dangerous emergency scenarios including severe turbulence, cabin decompressions, and fires.


CHECK-IN

Explore unique hotels on your layovers where you will be welcomed with a level of accommodation that is determined by your career performance.
